title: WindowBlinds 7.3 with Patch (info only)
description:
First -> piratebay is horrible relating in giving advices for uploaded torrent because the writing comment option is completely useless. So I choose this way to describe to get WindowBlinds7 work. Therefore this is not a torrent rather than a description. Please thank piratebay for this!

I needed a torrent to post here -> DO NOT download this torrent.

Okay, it seems that WB8 works with themes for WB8 only - do NOT use wba's from WB7 or WB6 - result will be changed to classic mode if starts.
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8815782/WindowBlinds_8_-_Full_Version_%28with_Patch%29_-__K_llERoY512_" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8815782/WindowBlinds_8_-_Full_Version_%28with_Patch%29_-__K_llERoY512_</a>

Here is my solution (please understand that I do not have time to control the 30 days trail - please post here if it should not work):

You need the correct version and the correct patch if you want to use wbas for WB7!

Version 7.3 seems to work (available here):
 <a href="
http://www.filehorse.com/download-windowblinds/8863" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehorse.com/download-windowblinds/8863</a>

You need the correct patch:


You must be logged in to download from 4shared - account is free. Sorry, I have tried this page only and works - there are other filehosters with this file - post if you know a better way to get this file (it has to be the same of course). :)

Please control version of "WindowBlinds7_public.exe" by clicking right mouse button and choose tab Details. You will see under version for data i.e. 7.3.0.0.

Install note:
1. disable network connector
2. install wb7.3
3. block with firewall -> pay attention to the video in Extras
3. reboot in save mode -> Start -> type "msconfig" -> Start/StartOptions -> Safe Mode
4. copy patch in WB main folder i.e. C:Program Files (x86)StardockObject DesktopWindowBlinds
5. run patch as administrator under 7/Vista -> wait till patching is done
6. reboot system and activate network connector

If something should not work please inform the other users (possibly tell proposal for solution) - I am not the uploader of WB7 and I try to gear the featured programs and cracks on this page.
